basisSet.dc:title: cc-pCV5Z
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Core/Valence Quintuple Zeta (cc-pCV5Z) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References B - Ne: (18s,12p,7d,5f,3g,1h) -> [10s,9p,7d,5f,3g,1h] D. Woon, K. Peterson Al- Ar: (20s,12p,8d,6f,4g,2h) -> [7s,6p,4d,3f,2g,1h] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 117,10548 (2002). Ca : (26s,18p,12d,6f,4g,2h)-> [12s,10p,9d,6f,4g,2h] J. Koput and K.A. Peterson, J. Phys. Chem. A, 106, 9595 (2002)
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.

Note: for Ca the S- and P-functions are already included in the contraction of the basis set itself.
